meanings.sent1: The tenebrous forest was filled with spooky shadows.
meanings.sent2: The room became tenebrous as the sun set outside.
meanings.sent3: The tenebrous alley seemed like the perfect place for a ghost to hide.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as tenebrous as the night sky, filled with unknown depths.
meanings.sent5: The tenebrous cave echoed with the sound of dripping water, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The tenebrous origins of the ancient artifact puzzled the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: The meaning of the cryptic message remained tenebrous to the codebreakers.
meanings.sent3: The tenebrous plot of the movie kept the audience guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: His past was a tenebrous labyrinth, full of hidden secrets and unanswered questions.
meanings.sent5: The tenebrous figure in the corner of the room seemed to vanish into thin air, leaving behind a sense of unease.
